<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs=""
>
[Secret Eater](/Feats.aspx?ID=3890) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoul Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504)

</column>

---

You have discovered and found favor with the cult within the church of Kabriri known as the Secret Eaters. You have maggots that writhe under your skin with the power to wriggle out from between your teeth, glean secrets from those you devour, and whisper them telepathically into your mind. Once per hour when you [Consume Flesh](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504), you can select a single Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill whose secrets you wish to uncover. You become subject to the effects of [_corpse communion_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=94) as if you had critically succeeded at casting the ritual: you learn a significant piece of lore, a forgotten secret, or some other tantalizing nugget of knowledge that is of immediate use to you.

<title level="2">Secret Eater leads to...</title>
[Bodysnatcher](/Feats.aspx?ID=3892), [Breath of Hungry Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3894), [Graveshift](/Feats.aspx?ID=3893), [Wrath of the First Ghoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=3895)
